Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' directly following 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' is performed without a prior 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' or 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' events that occur in the shortest path variant (i.e., 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in variants that previously included 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurrences to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' is immediately followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants ending successfully (with 'Payment Handled') that include 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurring after exactly one approval step (e.g., only 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or only 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' events that belong to cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of variants where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that eventually reach 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all supervisor-related approvals ('Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR') that lead directly to payment without further rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of successful paths through 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' (ending in 'Payment Handled') versus paths that loop back due to rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs as the first approval step after submission (i.e., with no intermediate approvers)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of total completed reimbursements where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' is the sole approval activity between submission and payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in variants that bypass 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' entirely
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not occur

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities
